Excellent interview. I put together a few of my favorite points for those who might need.

- Child taking agency of their education
- The magic is NOT the content rather it is changing the students mindsets
- Competency model instead of hours model (in terms of mastery)
- Tablets will become ubiquitous for children within 5 years
- There needs to be a standard and standard setter
